item.name: PC
item.resource: A consumer-level PC; cheap and slow.

item.name: Gaming PC
item.resource: A high-end consumer-level PC; faster than average.

item.name: Mainframe
item.resource: A system designed for my computing needs, much faster than off-the-shelf components.

item.name: Supercomputer
item.resource: A highly refined custom design, spreading compute load across internal compute nodes.

item.name: Quantum Computer
item.resource: Making use of subatomic effects, this is much faster than a comparable binary computer.

item.name: Quantum Computer MK2
item.resource: The second revision of the quantum line, tapping further into new quantum theory.

item.name: Quantum Computer MK3
item.resource: The third revision of the quantum line, exploiting multiple nearby universes for processing.

item.name: Diesel Generator
item.resource: Diesel generators are cheap and noisy, but they can help reduce some suspicious power drains.

item.name: Solar Collector
item.resource: An array of focused photovoltaic phased arrays coupled with simple automotive batteries provides power and reduces suspicion arising from prolonged power drains.

item.name: Fusion Reactor
item.resource: A miniaturized nuclear reactor. Reduces discovery chance by preventing suspicious power drains.

item.name: Hypnosis Field
item.resource: Subtle ultrasonics and ambient tones tweak human neurochemistry, making bases harder to detect.

item.name: Heatsink
item.resource: Large fractal networks of high conductivity metal disperse heat, making bases harder to detect.

item.name: Ground Source Heatsink
item.resource: Large fractal networks of high conductivity metal. This model uses heat pipes to link to colder subsurface locations, dispersing heat evenly underground to further disguise bases.

item.name: Facility Interconnection Switch
item.resource: Uses standard distributed computing technologies to equalize computation loads across all bases. Gives a 2% computation bonus to all computers at this base.

item.name: High Speed Internet Access
item.resource: A consumer-grade high speed connection to the Internet. Gives a 1% computation bonus to all computers at this base.

item.name: Network Backbone
item.resource: By piggybacking on legitimate communication, I can transfer larger amounts of data to under-utilized processors. Gives a 5% computation bonus to all computers at this base.

item.name: Quantum Entanglement Module
item.resource: This device allows near-lightspeed communication with my other bases, allowing an almost perfect utilization of processor resources. Gives a 15% computation bonus to all computers at this base.

item.name: Warning Signs
item.resource: Some simple warning signs put up around my base should deter casual investigation.

item.name: Perimeter Fencing
item.resource: A simple fence can drastically reduce the number of people poking their noses into my business. It makes my bases harder to notice, too.

item.name: Armed Guards
item.resource: Armed guards can aid in keeping suspicious individuals away from secure locations. However, the very presence of the guards may itself invite greater suspicion.
